name: girya
description: Small set of tools for all the heavy-lifting

scripts.alias-all: npm run alias-eslint; npm run alias-istanbul; npm run alias-jasmine-node
scripts.prep-tests:
rm -fr reports/; mkdir reports/; mkdir reports/eslint/; mkdir reports/junit/; echo "Reports
---" > reports/README.md
scripts.test: npm run alias-all; jasmine-node --junitreport tests/specs/; mv reports/*.xml reports/junit/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
scripts.check-eslint: npm run alias-all; OUT='./reports/eslint/eslint.txt'; date > $OUT; eslint src/*.js >> $OUT; eslint ./index.js >> $OUT; eslint tests/specs/*.js >> $OUT; echo "DONE!"
scripts.check-coverage: rm -fr reports/coverage/; npm run alias-all; istanbul cover --include-all-sources -x "**src/tools/**" jasmine-node tests/specs/; rm -fr reports/coverage/; mv coverage reports/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
scripts.tests: npm test; npm run check-eslint; npm run check-coverage
scripts.all: npm run rebuild; npm run tests

author: Martin Swiderski
